extendedInfo.description: Hi! :-)This live wallpaper born from fantastic idea of my first app "Magic touch: Water waves phone" view https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.custom.lwp.MagictouchWaterwavesphoneoneIt's very interactive. With finger touch you create a water's ripple effect...you see the result effect!In setting menu is possible to set three different backgrounds.This live wallpaper that takes up very little space on your phone and also can be moved on SD memory.Enjoy!!!Instruction for use:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpaperswww.reviewbreaker.com writes about us:Magic touch water waves is a beautiful live wallpaper which is touch sensitive and gives a rippling effect just like you touch a pond. There are three different beautiful backgrounds. This wonderful app is available for free in the android market.Creating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (push notification or other) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!
